1364890.name: Increase World
1364890.description:
A real village made for fun!


You are the Grand Manager and elected.
Now is the time to take charge of your own crafting factory and resource the village to keep your dwellers / survivors alive.
Organize your village, manage your inhabitants, buy buildings, machines, factories etc ...
Then design efficient production and defense lines, all on time and with zombies in mind!


An open experience in a sandbox!


Calm down, it's a sandbox experience where you think and poke around until everything works the way you want it to.
Provide products to your customers by exporting them to an ever changing market as you produce more than 50 unique types of products, made from many elements and parts / items all of which can be created with different materials like wood, wood, iron, brick etc ...
But also thanks to other production methods.
No two buildings / factories are alike.


Small hands, big dreams!


with just a small village and expand it.
Unlock increasingly sophisticated machines and buildings, add even more power, water, power and most importantly, more space.
Soon you will be operating multiple production lines, making hundreds of perfected products every day, and happily watching your lovely inhabitants but also survivors do the job.


Characteristics :


  • Unique creations and wide range of objects / buildings / products
  • Focus on practical issues and not on values, economics or defense logistics and defense
  • Organizer all stages of production and sale / export
  • Factories grow as you unlock more space
  • Fully simulated day / night cycle!
  • Take care of your survivors! If you make them work too hard, or don't have enough resources, they all fall
  • Nice city-style art style Low Poly
